commit message:
Checking SIM operator ≠ null before returning wrong SIM operator.
(this is a first attempt to try to fix a crash on Acer E350 after disabling airplane mode)
Fixed wrong statistics after service close and fixed export for API lower than 19 (try-with-resources not supported).

Finally fixed E350 airplane mode crash.

The solution was to check if Mobile Operator string is empty instead of null. This is a specific issue.
Used IOUtils.close(…) method to close resources.
